abstract: NHL Roundup; New York Islanders defeat Calgary Flames, 2-1, in overtime.

headline.print_headline: Islanders Beat Flames With 18 Seconds Left in Overtime
headline.main: Islanders Beat Flames With 18 Seconds Left in Overtime

snippet: With Josh Bailey’s goal in the waning moments, the Islanders avoided a shootout and improved to 3-0 on their seven-game trip.
lead_paragraph: With Josh Bailey’s goal in the waning moments, the Islanders avoided a shootout and improved to 3-0 on their seven-game trip.
